mapper.select:
select a.real_call_id, a.real_order_id, a.call_price_money, a.call_submit_deadline, a.prepayed_money_amount, a.vilation_money_amount,a.create_time, a.state,c.company_name,b.cas_no,b.user_id, b.image from t_real_order_callprice a, t_real_order b, t_certification c
a.state = 'HERE'or a.state = 'OTHER'
a.state = 'CANCEL'or a.state = 'BUYER_CANCEL'
a.state = #{status}
and a.user_id = #{userId} and b.user_id = c.user_id and a.real_order_id = b.real_order_id
and (b.cas_no like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
order by a.real_call_id asc
, ${orderColumn} ${orderType}

select a.real_order_id, a.real_call_id, a.call_price_money, a.call_submit_deadline, a.prepayed_money_amount, a.vilation_money_amount, b.company_name, b.user_id, b.certificate_id, a.call_purity, a.call_price_amount from t_real_order_callprice a, t_certification b
a.user_id = b.user_id and a.real_order_id = #{realOrderId} and a.state = 'BIDDING'
and (b.company_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
order by a.real_call_id asc
, ${orderColumn} ${orderType}

select b.cas_no, b.english_name, b.chinese_name, b.image, a.call_price_amount, a.call_price_money, a.call_purity, a.call_submit_deadline, a.offer_diagram, a.make_bill, a.other_require, a.prepayed_money_amount, a.vilation_money_amount from t_real_order_callprice a, t_real_order b where a.real_call_id = #{realCallId} and a.real_order_id = b.real_order_id
